snippet.title: Amarantus - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the updated trailer, with a new feature we added to the game: https://youtu.be/_9F3rzTjGo0

Amarantus is a visual novel about trainwrecks, trysts & treason, coming in 2023.
Roadtrip across the country to take down a tyrant. Befriend, torment, woo or wingman your party. Decide who you want to be. And maybe, just maybe: make it out of this one alive. 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1941100/Amarantus/
https://www.ub4q.games/amarantus
